# TurfSpot

> The easiest way to find and book sports turfs in your city.

## Website Overview

TurfSpot is a comprehensive platform connecting sports enthusiasts with turf owners. It simplifies the process of finding, booking, and managing sports venues.
URL: https://turfspot.in

## Main Navigation

- **Home**: [https://turfspot.in/](https://turfspot.in/) - Landing page with search and featured turfs.
- **Browse Turfs**: [https://turfspot.in/turfs.html](https://turfspot.in/turfs.html) - Full catalog of sports venues with filters.
- **Discover**: [https://turfspot.in/discover.html](https://turfspot.in/discover.html) - Advanced search and discovery interface.
- **Login/Register**: Accessible via the main navigation bar.

## Core Features

### For Players
- **Search**: Find turfs by city, sport (Cricket, Football, Badminton, etc.), and amenities.
- **Booking**: Real-time slot availability and instant booking.
- **Payments**: Secure online payments via Razorpay or "Pay at Venue" options.
- **User Dashboard**: Manage bookings and view history.

### For Turf Owners
- **Owner Dashboard**: Manage turf listings, pricing, and slots.
- **Analytics**: View booking trends and revenue.

## Technical Context
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js
- **Database**: MongoDB
